newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: Namco wins Koichab diamond licence in Namibia.
newsitem.headline: Namco wins Koichab diamond licence in Namibia.

text.p: The Namibian Minerals Corporation (Namco) said on Wednesday the Namibian ministry of mines and energy had given it a 15-year marine diamond mining licence for the Koichab prospect off Luderitz Bay.
A statement said the company had evaluated the off-shore prospect last year and established a resource of 2.4 million carats of gem quality diamonds.
It said Namco was developing an 85-tonne sub-sea crawler system in partnership with the Dresser Industries company SubSea Offshore Ltd which was due to start work in the third quarter of 1997.
